appDesc.message: Set a default speed for video and audio.

firefoxBackdropWarning.message: Warning: For backdrop filters, Firefox users need to enable 'gfx.webrender.all' and 'layout.css.backdrop-filter.enabled' by going to the 'about:config' URL. Restart Firefox after enabling the two flags.

fxPanal_queryTooltip.message: CSS selector used to find elements to filter. For example, 'video, img' will query for both videos and images. For advanced usage, view documentation online about CSS selectors.

command_nothingTooltip.message: Can come in handy in combination with (G) greedy mode to block certain keys.

command_setMarkTooltip.message: Mark the current video/audio time position for future reference.

command_seekMarkTooltip.message: Go to a marked video/audio time position. If no mark exists, it will set a mark.

command_toggleLoopTooltip.message: Set loop between the marked position and the current position.

command_cycleFilterValueTooltip.message: cycle between provided values. Can be used to toggle invert, grayscale, sepia, etc.

options_mediaToggleDesc.message: media mode will ignore key press unless page has video or audio.

options_greedyToggleDesc.message: greedy mode will try to block event propagation and default behaviors.

options_languageTooltip.message: All languages except English were translated using online tools. Refresh tab to see changes.

options_pinByDefaultTooltip.message: Each tab will be pinned by default.

options_hideIndicatorTooltip.message: Some shortcuts show a feedback indicator on the top-left of the page.

options_hideBadgeTooltip.message: The badge is the text on the extension icon.

options_usePollingTooltip.message: Two ways to query for elements. The default method is to track changes using the MutationObserver API. This will be more efficient in the long run. The alternative algorithm is to periodically check for target elements.

options_issueDirective.message: Create a new issue on the Github page.

options_help_stateDesc.message: Suspend extension for the current context.

options_help_pinDesc.message: Pinning a tab allows it to have it's own context (speed, activation, filters, etc).

options_help_fxDesc.message: You can enable filters (contrast, invert, grayscale, etc) on elements (by default, only videos) or even the whole page.

options_help_localPrompt.message: For the extension to work on local files or on incognito mode.

options_help_localDirective.message: They need to be enabled at the extension page.
